devdoc.details: This contract is used as the main control point for executing strategies

params.amount: The total amount of profit received from liquidation
params.bank: The address of the Bank which uses the Strategy

params.from: The address of the token to liquidate for Oh! Tokens

constructor.details: Sets initial buyback and management fee parameters

params.token_: The address of the Oh! Token

params.bank: The bank that will be used to exit the strategy
The bank that will be used to exit the strategy

finance(address).details: Only allow this function to be called on approved Banks

params.bank: The address of the Bank to finance

financeAll(address).details: Deposit queue not needed here as all Strategies are equally invested inOnly allow this function to be called on approved Banks

params.bank: The address of the Bank to finance

setBank(address,bool).details: Only Governance can call this function

params._approved: the approval status of the bank

setLiquidator(address,address,address).details: Only Governance can call this function

params._from: the token we have to liquidate
params._to: the token we want to receive

setRegistry(address).details: Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used

setStrategy(address,address,bool).details: Only Governance can call this function

params._approved: the approval status of the Strategy
params._bank: the bank which uses the strategy

setWhitelisted(address,bool).details: Only Governance can call this function

params._whitelisted: the whitelisted status of the strategy

params.bank: The address of the Bank that contains the Strategy
params.i: The Bank queue index to check

params.bank: The Bank to check the next Strategy for

_banks.details: The set of Banks approved for investing

_depositQueue.details: The mapping of Banks to next Strategy index it will deposit to

_strategies.details: The mapping of Banks to active Strategies

_withdrawQueue.details: The mapping of Banks to next Strategy index it will withdraw from

devdoc.title: Oh! Finance Manager

AccrueRevenue(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a Bank realizes profit via liquidation

Buyback(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a buyback is performed with an amount of from tokens

Finance(address,address).notice: Emitted when a Bank's capital is invested in a single Strategy

FinanceAll(address).notice: Emitted when a Bank's capital is invested in all Strategies

Rebalance(address).notice: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced

buyback(address).notice: Perform a token buyback with accrued revenue

buybackFee().notice: The amount of profits reserved for protocol buybacks, base 1000

constructor.notice: Deploy the Manager with the Registry reference

exit(address,address).notice: Exit a given strategy for a given bank

exitAll(address).notice: Exit from all strategies for a given bank

finance(address).notice: Finance the next Strategy in the Bank queue with all available underlying

financeAll(address).notice: Evenly finance underlying to all strategies

liquidators(address,address).notice: The mapping of `from` token to `to` token to liquidator contract

managementFee().notice: The amount of profits reserved for fund management, base 1000

rebalance(address).notice: Rebalance Bank exposure by withdrawing all, then evenly distributing underlying to all strategies

setBank(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a Bank for investment

setBuybackFee(uint256).notice: Sets the protocol buyback percentage (Profit Share)

setLiquidator(address,address,address).notice: Sets the Liquidator contract for a given token

setManagementFee(uint256).notice: Sets the protocol management fee percentage

setRegistry(address).notice: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance.

setStrategy(address,address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a Strategy for a given Bank

strategies(address,uint256).notice: Get the Strategy at a given index for a given Bank

token().notice: The address of the Oh! Finance Token

totalStrategies(address).notice: Get total number of strategies for a given bank

whitelisted(address).notice: The mapping of contracts that are whitelisted for Bank use/management

withdrawIndex(address).notice: Get the index of the Strategy to withdraw from for a given Bank

userdoc.notice: The Manager contains references to all active banks, strategies, and liquidation contracts.
